name: frappe_pywce
description: Frappe pywce web apps. It manages the emulator, studio and bridge for pywce whatsapp web client emulator.

scripts.build: cd studio && yarn install && yarn build && cd ../emulator && yarn install && yarn build
scripts.postinstall: cd studio && yarn install && cd ../emulator && yarn install && cd ../bridge && npm install

author: DonnC <github.com/DonnC>
